entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bay Roberts

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then west 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 28 January 2023
